Delivering the beauty of nature to life.

About us

Kaymin Marble has close connections with the quaries of Mugla Region. We acquire marble blocks from these quaries and by the help of our natural stone processing technology, we tranform them to products with international standards by using our precise engineering skills and workmanship. From our own factory, we deliver these products to our customers which are mainly (95%) the customers in abroad.

Kaymin Marble is established in 2015 by 3 partners; Halil Kaya (Mining Engineer), Çağlar Fırat Öztürk (City Planner) and Yasemin Kaya Öztürk (Economist) with the idea to deliver high quality Turkish Marble to the world. Thanks to its innovatiove and young management, Kaymin Marble is processing the famous Turkish marbles into valuable products and delivers it to the world market.

Marble, with its durability and wide varity, has taken significant place in every day life and still increases its popularity together with the expanding construction sector. Kaymin Marble, which has an annual 120.000 sqm cut-to-size capacity, is able to serve to its customers with perfectly processed products from Europe, USA and Israel.

Imagination is everything.

Its just a preview of the beautyness waiting for you. Albert Einstein

Our Vision

Being a worldwide company and creating added value by performing our duties at its best

Our Mission

Processing the natural resource marbles of our country in the best possible quality to be able to convert it to a valuable product for living areas and to maximize the customer needs.

Sustainable Quality

Trying to match the needs of our customer in a quick and precise way, especially the quality level of products which will guarantee the customer satisfaction, will be our most important asset for our future.

Environment; Our Basic Responsibility

We have the responsibility in the name of our staff, suppliers ans customers to increase the awarness for environmental polution. In this respect, like every individuals asset, we put great importance on exposing minimum waste during every production stage to our nature.

With regards to our basic responsibility, by using our engineering background, we process the marble with a tailor attitude and we maintain great care during our productions to get the most out of the raw materials and to minimize the residue

We deliver the natural stones of our country to the world, which contains no toxic material, inflamable, is friendly with aging and has an immortal structure.

We are processing the marble supplied from variuos quaries of our country with +-1mm tolerance in our own factory. The products can be used both in exterior and interior of the building, depending on the customer needs.

Marbles are cut, sized, polished, sandblasted, trimmed and bevelled before the check-point which leads them to the packaging before starting their journey. The packaging is done and checked in a careful way with additional equipments in order to maintain their conditions through their journey.

News

We are at Marble 2019 Fair

The exhibition will be held in the new fairground between 27-30 March 2019. We will be exhibiting our products by taking part in the International Natural Stone and Technologies Fair. Marble, which is among the first three marble exhibitions in the world with the number of visitors in the field of national and international construction sector and equipment, stands out with its visitors in the heart of the sector that wants to follow the trends of the sector.

We are one of the best 16 in the marble export business in Mugla

MUĞLA (AA) - Head of Aegean Marble Exporters Union Mevlüt Kaya, stated that they want to boost the mine and natural stone export with the words " Our aim is to quickly reach to 5.5 billion USD export level and to move beyond"
